title: Mueller probing Russia contacts at GOP convention: sources
text:
Mueller probing Russia contacts at GOP convention: sources 10:15pm EDT - 01:48 
Investigators probing whether Donald Trump’s presidential campaign colluded with Russia have been questioning witnesses about events at the 2016 Republican National Convention, according to two sources familiar with Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s inquiries. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Investigators probing whether Donald Trump’s presidential campaign colluded with Russia have been questioning witnesses about events at the 2016 Republican National Convention, according to two sources familiar with Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s inquiries.
